about_the_game:
Digital Pets

Ultra Auto Gotchimon is a game with digital pets that sit on top of your screen, enabling you to care for your creatures effortlessly while multitasking. If you crave a more immersive experience, dive into strategic auto-battles, where you strategically select moves, navigate procedurally generated regions, and evolve your creatures.

Designed for Multitasking

Multitasking seamlessly—whether you're engaging in creature battles while watching YouTube or opting to magnify the game for a focused experience. Enjoy the flexibility to resize, move, and click through the game, maintaining its overlay presence. Immerse yourself in a world of synergies, unique typings, and evolving strategies in this auto-battler/virtual pet simulation hybrid.

Craft the perfect combination of moves and types by fusing moves together to create multi-typed moves, and train your Gotchi to adopt new typings.

Embark on a journey through procedurally generated regions with random events and battles, all while leveling up your Gotchi.

Show your Gotchi some love by taking care of it—feed it, play with it, and keep it happy. They'll be your loyal companions while you work, watch TV, or attend to other tasks. Collect all 19 unique Gotchis and create your ultimate team!

movies.name: Announcement Teaser for UAG - Auto Battling, Digital Pet Fun!

name: Ultra Auto Gotchimon

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i5 2500k / Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated Graphics Recommended
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Level up multitasking with digital pets on your screen. Immerse in auto-battles, fuse moves for unique tactics, and care for virtual pets while leveling them up. This unique creature collection auto-battler plays as an overlay – your perfect companion for work and entertainment!
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Japanese*, Polish*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Simplified Chinese*, Turkish*, Greek*, Portuguese - Portugal*, Russian*, Spanish - Latin America*
*languages with full audio support
